website_summaries.verdict: While it's not the perfect replacement for an everyday wristwatch, the iOS and Android-friendly Meta M1 is a simplified smartwatch that gets a lot of things right.
pros: The Meta M1 smartwatch has an attractive, aggressive design, works with Android and iOS, lasts multiple days on a single charge, and can filter notifications from your phone
It's also visible in bright sunlight
cons: A simplified set of features that might not satisfy everyone
UI can get confusing to navigate
The built-in watch faces aren't as attractive as the actual watch

customer_reviews.title: Meta M1 Stops Very Short
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is excellent, beautiful band and thick stainless steel watch. But that is were the quality stops, The OS is very primitive and very difficult to read. The six buttons have to be pressed hard to function and sometimes appear unresponsive. It shows the battery life of the phone but still can not find the battery life for the watch. Forget about readable watch faces.The charger seems to work well and is simple to use. Its a shame, great quality watch but horrible interface. Pebble should have purchased Meta,
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ray

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: watch cannot be setup or used. It's a gorgeous watch, but it needs to contact[...] which is no longer available. You cant even use it to tell time, it stays on the setup screen.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Scandal

customer_reviews.title: angel
customer_reviews.text: didn't work at all i sent it back. it didn't pair with my iphone
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL MIRANDA

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the company has been dissolved
customer_reviews.text: Did not work, couldn't get the android app to work. It looks like the company has been dissolved. It has now become a cool looking paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my son. He has an iPhone 6 plus and the watch works perfectly. No problems. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: C.  Long, CO

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this product
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product, META watch is officially closed and there is no way to activate this watch. After trying with multiple ways I had to return this. They should remove this from sale.
customer_reviews.author: Sandika Peiris

customer_reviews.title: Support of these watch has been discontinued. It doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Support of these watch has been discontinued. It doesn't pair with any META Iphone apps (tried 5, 5S and 6) which means that they do not work at all. Doesn't even show time. It's a shame considering the high quality of the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Katya Kazbek

customer_reviews.title: The only bad thing I can say is that the watch faces ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is well made. The only bad thing I can say is that the watch faces are limited.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Company "forced to cease its business activities", No customer support
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! My sister bought me this for Christmas and within 3 days, it will no longer connect with my Samsung Galaxy S5! I tried contacting customer support and i received the following automated response:Dear Valued META Customer, Due to unforeseen market challenges META Watch has been forced to cease it's business activities, and doesn't have means to provide personal support for its products any more. Should you experience any issues with your META product please consult the FAQs and documentation available on our website using the following link. (...) Apologies for the situation. META Watch Thanks in advance for your patience and support. Looks to me like their out of business. GO A DIFFERENT ROUTE, DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company is out of business.... Don't get burned
customer_reviews.text: why is such a good watch going for so cheap. the Company is out of business. There is no support and I can't even charge the darn thing from day one. I got burned. I don't want anyone else to get burned too.
customer_reviews.author: Casacove

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch for what I was looking for! Superior style to the other smart watches out there with just enough of the bells and whistles.Professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sue H
